name: Autonomous Vehicle
description:
“The fully driverless car exists only in the future. Yet it is already part of an apparatus of imaginaries, narratives and epistemological and computational practices; it is an emerging technology brought into, and bearing unto, the world - as an AI/robot, as a big data infrastructure, and as a conventional vehicle.”
– Maya Indira Ganesh

Maya Indira Ganesh doctoral work at Leuphana University Lüneburg investigates machine learning, ethics and accountability. She leads the new Masters program on AI, Ethics, and Society at Cambridge University (UK), where she’s affiliated with the Leverhulme Centre for the Future of Intelligence and the Institute for Continuing Education.
